title: Sharelife: Loan Management System
desc: A web application made for Sharelife Consumers Cooperative to oversee the loans it holds for its members.

title: Labubuddy: Lab Reservation System
desc: A web application for viewing and reserving available seats in DLSU's computer laboratories.

title: ManaHealth: Workout and Meal Planner
desc: An interactive prototype of an application that combines meal and fitness planning.

title: Facilities & Resources Record Keeper
desc: A Java application for managing the reservation of community resources and facilities.

title: Hotel Reservation System
desc: A Java Swing application for managing hotel room selection, viewing, and reservation.

title: State of Global Air Dataset Manager
desc: An application made using C that sorts the mentioned dataset in terms of meaningful questions.

title: Elevens Game
desc: The classic game elevens reimagined through C, run on the command line and implementing a colored interface.
